source_sentence: 普賢菩薩行願王經
translation: Samantabhadra Bodhisattva's Sutra of the King of Practice Vows

source_sentence: 盡諸十方世界尊　　普遊三世人師子
translation: all the world-honored ones of the ten directions, who travel throughout the three times like a lion

source_sentence: 我身口意具清淨　　是故今當遍稽首
translation: Because my body, speech, and mind are pure. Therefore, I bow down to you in homage.

source_sentence: 以普賢行諸願力　　一切最勝相現前
俯身量等剎土塵　　虔心卛禮於大聖
translation: He bowed down to the dust of all the buddha-fields, reverently venerating the Great Sage.

source_sentence: 一微塵上眾塵佛　　各於其中佛子遶
translation: In that universe there are as many buddha-fields as atoms in all the directions, each surrounded by ten thousand buddha-fields.

source_sentence: 是諸法界盡無邊　　如來皆遍當勝解
是諸德海量難盡　　以言枝派結無涯
translation: It is hard to fathom the depth of this ocean of virtues, because its branches are infinite.

source_sentence: 諸佛功德敷演故　　一切善願我當讚
translation: I will praise all the virtues of the Buddhas,

source_sentence: 最勝妙華及花鬘　　最勝妙燈及鑪香
translation: most exquisite flowers and flower garlands, most exquisite lamps and aromatic powders

source_sentence: 音聲塗香及寶蓋　　恭敬供養一切佛
translation: offering incense, perfumes, and precious canopies to all the Buddhas;

source_sentence: 勝妙衣服及薰香　　末香積裏等須彌
translation: Sumeru with its exquisite clothes and fragrant incense, the accumulation of powdered incense equal to a mountain

source_sentence: 勝妙一切莊嚴具　　恭敬供養於善遊
translation: They are adorned with all kinds of beautiful ornaments and offered to the well-journed.

source_sentence: 深信普賢行願力　　如是無上廣大施
translation: of the great faith which is consummate in the power of the vows of Samantabhadra;

source_sentence: 此皆將獻於十方　　恭敬供養一切佛
translation: These offerings will be offered to all the buddhas of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 為以貪嗔癡為因　　身業口業及意業
translation: It is the cause of lust, anger, hatred, and folly; it is the result of physical action, verbal action, and mental action.

source_sentence: 若有所造於不善　　如來我今皆懺悔
translation: Reverend Tathāgata, I repent of all sins.

source_sentence: 十方諸佛與菩薩　　緣覺有學及無學
translation: The buddhas and bodhisattvas of the ten directions are pratyekabuddhas, those who have training and those who have no training

source_sentence: 及與眾生諸功德　　我當隨喜於一切
translation: I will rejoice in all the virtues of all living beings,

source_sentence: 十方諸界作燈者　　願證無著佛菩薩
如是於諸大導師　　我請轉於無上輪
translation: And thus, reverend Śāriputra, I invite you to turn the irreversible wheel of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 有佛欲取於涅槃　　為利一切有情故
translation: It is the seat of enlightenment, because all living beings want to attain it.

source_sentence: 我以合掌當跪請　　令願住劫剎土塵
translation: With joined my palms, I will kneel and pray that you may abide in the duration of the kalpa.

source_sentence: 禮拜供養與懺悔　　隨喜啟發及勸請
translation: to venerate, make offerings, and repent; to joyfully initiate and encourage

source_sentence: 我於積集少善根　　皆用迴向大菩提
translation: I dedicate all my accumulated roots of virtue to great enlightenment

source_sentence: 過去十方諸善逝　　住於世者皆供養
translation: And the saints of the ten directions honored them with offerings to those who lived in the world.

source_sentence: 所有未來諸善逝　　速令願滿證菩提
translation: All the well-gone ones of the future will quickly cause their vows to be fulfilled and realize enlightenment

source_sentence: 盡於十方諸剎土　　皆得廣大令清淨
translation: To the extent that all the buddha-fields of the ten directions are enlarged and purified

source_sentence: 菩薩樹下等覺尊　　及諸佛子願圓滿
translation: At the foot of the bodhisattva's tree, the honored one Equanimokṣa and the heirs of the Buddha fulfill their vows.

source_sentence: 所是十方有情類　　願得無漏常安樂
translation: They belong to all living beings in the ten directions, wishing to attain peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 所是眾生諸法義　　願所希望隨意成
菩提諸行我當行　　願生六趣智宿命
translation: Enlightenment consists of the realization that all living beings are born in the six states of rebirth.

source_sentence: 若於世界受身時　　願我出家果恒遂
隨順修學諸最勝　　普賢行行令圓滿
translation: He cultivates the practice of universal goodness in order to perfect it.

source_sentence: 無垢清淨尸羅等　　願常無缺無瑕穢
translation: undefiled, pure, such as Śīlabhadra, he wishes for permanence without fail and without blemish.

source_sentence: 天龍夜叉鳩槃荼　　人及諸類發眾聲
translation: The gods, dragons, yakṣas, kumbhāṇḍas, humans, and other creatures make a loud noise

source_sentence: 各各所有一切音　　我隨彼音為說法
translation: I teach the Dharma according to the sounds of all the different kinds of sounds.

source_sentence: 調善精勤修十度　　願常不忘菩提心
translation: of the aspiration for enlightenment, consummately cultivating the ten transcendences;

source_sentence: 所有諸惡成障者　　如是皆願盡消滅
translation: May all the evil deeds that obstruct enlightenment be eliminated!

source_sentence: 業與煩惱諸魔道　　行於世間得解脫
translation: Likewise, liberation can be found in all the worlds where there is neither action nor defilement.

source_sentence: 不著於水喻蓮花　　經空無礙如日月
translation: Like a lotus flower that is not attached to water, like the sun and moon in space.

source_sentence: 所有十方剎土中　　惡趣眾苦盡消除
translation: In all the buddha-fields of the ten directions, All the miseries of the evil destinies Will be eliminated.

source_sentence: 安致有情安樂處　　饒益諸行利群品
translation: He wishes to bring peace and happiness to all living beings in order to benefit all living beings.

source_sentence: 能令圓滿菩提行　　隨順眾生轉彼行
translation: He can cause all living beings to develop the practice of enlightenment,

source_sentence: 開示普賢菩薩行　　盡未來劫行此行
translation: To show them the practice of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra, so that in all future ages they may do so.

source_sentence: 熟能與我同行行　　願得與之常相隨
translation: May they be accompanied by me and always associate with me.

source_sentence: 身業口業及意業　　與彼行行願為一
translation: One’s bodily action, one’s verbal action, and one’s mental action are the same as their volition.

source_sentence: 欲利於我諸善友　　開演普賢諸行者
translation: He wishes to benefit all my spiritual benefactors, so that they may develop the practice of universal good.

source_sentence: 如是願得常相遇　　我不違背於彼意
translation: And, wishing to be always with them, I do not disobey their thoughts.

source_sentence: 佛子圍繞大尊師　　願我常得親覩見
於中廣行大供養　　盡未來劫無厭惓
translation: Throughout the aeons to come, they will perform great sacrifices without wearying.

source_sentence: 恒持諸佛最妙法　　菩薩之行令普示
translation: The practice of enlightening beings is to preserve all the teachings of the Buddhas and show them everywhere.

source_sentence: 為淨普賢菩薩行　　於未來劫我願行
translation: In order to purify the practice of Samantabhadra Bodhisattva, I will perform my vows in the future eon

source_sentence: 於三有中輪轉時　　證得無盡福德智
translation: At the moment of transmigration in the three existences, he realizes the inexhaustible knowledge of merit

source_sentence: 定惠方便及解脫　　願成諸得無盡藏
translation: wishing to perfect the inexhaustible store of concentration, wisdom, skillful means, and liberation

source_sentence: 一微塵上微塵剎　　於一剎中無量佛
translation: In a single moment of thought there are as many Buddhas as atoms in all the buddha-fields,

source_sentence: 佛子圍繞居中尊　　菩薩行行我瞻仰
如是無邊眾方所　　一毫髮上載三世
佛與剎土量如海　　行行如海眾多劫
一音言枝方大海　　皆是諸佛清淨音
隨其眾意而敷演　　願我常趣諸佛教
translation: I pray that all living beings will teach me the Dharma according to their wishes.

source_sentence: 遊於三世諸最勝　　當轉無上法輪時
如上諸佛無盡教　　我以惠力令善入
translation: As the Buddhas teach inexhaustibly, I cause them to enter by means of my superknowledgement

source_sentence: 所有未來眾多劫　　於一剎那我當證
translation: I will realize in a single instant all the many eons of the future

source_sentence: 如是諸劫歷三世　　剎那分中我當行
遊於三世人師子　　我於剎那盡瞻仰
常於諸佛上境界　　如幻解脫力所證
translation: It is the sphere of the Buddhas’ superknowledgements, like magical illusions, born of liberation.

source_sentence: 三世剎土眾莊嚴　　盡用建立一塵上
translation: all the adornments of the buddha-fields of the three times are established in a single atom

source_sentence: 如是無量諸方所　　亦願佛剎遍莊嚴
translation: May all the buddha-fields be adorned like this in infinity of directions

source_sentence: 所有未來諸世證　　盡證等覺轉法輪
translation: all the worldly realizations in the future that are fully realized and equally enlightened, turning the wheel of the Dharma

source_sentence: 示入涅槃證真際　　我願行於諸佛前
令諸神力速普往　　以大乘力趣普門
translation: to cause all the spirits of enlightenment to go everywhere, by means of the power of the great vehicle

source_sentence: 以行行力普功德　　諸大慈力普遍滿
translation: It is the seat of all virtues, consummated by the power of practice.

source_sentence: 普於眾善諸福力　　無有染著大智力
translation: of the great store of knowledge which is consummated in concentration on all virtues;

source_sentence: 智惠方便諸定力　　令正修行菩提力
translation: the power of knowledge, wisdom, skillful means, and concentration, so that they may correctly cultivate enlightenment

source_sentence: 常以清淨諸業力　　永除一切煩惱力
translation: Through the power of pure deeds, he removes all afflictions.

source_sentence: 諸作魔力令無力　　圓滿普賢行行力
translation: The power of the devils and demons makes them powerless, perfecting the practice of universal goodness.

source_sentence: 諸剎如海令諸淨　　有情諸海令解脫
translation: All the buddha-fields are like an ocean, purifying sentient beings and causing them to be liberated.

source_sentence: 諸法如海令了見　　智惠如海令善證
translation: The Dharma is like an ocean, enabling beings to see it; knowledge and wisdom are like an ocean, enabling them to realize it.

source_sentence: 行行如海令清淨　　誓願如海令圓滿
translation: His practice is like the ocean, purifying all living beings; his vow is like the ocean, fulfilling their aspirations.

source_sentence: 諸佛如海令供養　　歷劫如海行無倦
translation: Their offerings are like the ocean of all buddha-qualities, And their practice is unceasing for as many eons as there are in that ocean.

source_sentence: 所遊三世最勝尊　　菩提行願有眾多
用普賢行等覺已　　如是我當令圓滿
translation: As soon as one has attained the equanimity of Samantabhadra’s practice, I will perfect him.

source_sentence: 諸佛子中最為尊　　是故號之為普賢
translation: He is called Samantabhadra because he is the foremost among all the Buddha-heirs.

source_sentence: 與此大智同行故　　如是諸善悉迴向
translation: Because they associate with this great knowledge, they dedicate these roots of virtue to it.

source_sentence: 身口意業極清淨　　行淨眾剎亦清淨
translation: The purity of body, speech, and mind is supremely pure; so is the purity of all buddha-fields.

source_sentence: 普賢如何善迴向　　願我亦同於此行
為行極善普賢行　　文殊大願亦當行
未來諸劫勿厭疲　　菩薩此行皆圓滿
translation: In all future ages, the bodhisattva should not tire of these practices.

source_sentence: 如是等行勿有量　　亦願諸福勿有量
處於如是無量行　　一切變化願我知
translation: I wish to know the infinity of all such practices and all their manifestations.

source_sentence: 若有盡於虛空際　　眾生無盡亦如是
translation: And so it is with the infinity of space and all living beings.

source_sentence: 盡於業與煩惱際　　我之願際量亦然
translation: so is the boundlessness of my vows likewise at the end of action and defilement.

source_sentence: 所有十方無量剎　　眾寶莊嚴獻諸佛
translation: all the innumerable buddha-fields of the ten directions, adorned with myriad jewels

source_sentence: 人及諸大最勝樂　　如剎塵劫將供養
寧有聞此迴向經　　隨順深信大菩提
translation: How could there be anyone who hears this dedication of merit and believes in the great enlightenment?

source_sentence: 唯於此中生一信　　即成最勝功德聚
若人發此普賢願　　此乃遠離諸惡趣
translation: If one gives rise to this vow of universal goodness, he will be far removed from the evil destinies.

source_sentence: 又以棄絕諸惡友　　是人速見阿彌陀
此皆獲證最勝壽　　善來於此壽人身
translation: They all attain the supreme longevity of realization. Come, good man, to this life-span human being!

source_sentence: 有如普賢大菩薩　　皆能不久速成就
誰以無明力所作　　五無間等諸眾罪
translation: Who is guilty of the five mortal sins committed through the power of ignorance?

source_sentence: 其人誦此普賢願　　應時速得永盡際
translation: Those living beings who honor and serve this holy man’s vow will attain ultimate liberation.

source_sentence: 於諸色相及智惠　　種族容質皆圓滿
translation: He was well versed in all the marks, signs, colors, and knowledges.

source_sentence: 眾魔外道不能屈　　道於三界咸供養
為利一切有情故　　菩提樹下速安住
translation: In order to benefit all sentient beings, he quickly abides under the tree of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 成等正覺轉法輪　　降伏一切魔軍眾
translation: to become perfectly enlightened and turn the wheel of the Dharma, subduing all the armies of Māra

source_sentence: 若此普賢行行願　　受持讀誦解說者
此之果報唯佛知　　無上菩提勿生惑
translation: The Buddha alone knows the full extent of this phenomenon. Therefore, do not let confusion arise in your minds.

source_sentence: 譬如文殊威德智　　普賢菩薩亦如是
我隨修學如彼行　　是等諸善悉迴向
translation: I will follow their example and practice; thus practicing according to their ways, I will dedicate all my goodness

source_sentence: 遊於三世諸最勝　　所可稱讚所迴向
translation: He dwells in the best of the three worlds and dedicates his merit to them.

source_sentence: 我之如是眾善根　　為修普賢行迴向
translation: I dedicate these roots of virtue to the practice of universal good.

source_sentence: 若我當於命終時　　蠲除一切諸覆障
translation: At the end of my life, I will remove all obscurations and obstacles.

source_sentence: 目所親覩彌陀己　　遊彼極樂剎土中
既到彼已如是願　　誓得一切皆現前
translation: Having arrived there, he made this vow and vowed that all should appear.

source_sentence: 令我此皆極圓滿　　盡於世界利群生
translation: so that all living beings in the world will be perfectly enlightened.

source_sentence: 秀麗極樂佛道場　　生於上妙蓮花上
translation: the supremely beautiful lotus flower that grows on top of the buddha-field of ultimate bliss

source_sentence: 親向彌陀世尊所　　願我於此得授記
我得最勝授記已　　變化眾多百俱胝
translation: I've received the most excellent prediction, and my transformations are many hundreds of koṭis.

source_sentence: 令以惠力於十方　　於諸有情作饒益
translation: He causes all living beings in the ten directions to benefit by means of his spiritual benevolence.

source_sentence: 普賢菩薩行願王經
translation: Samantabhadra Bodhisattva's Sutra of the King of Practice Vows
